title.rendered: Patent Agent Examination 2025 by The Controller General of Patents, Designs and Trademarks [January 5; Online; 13 Centers]: Register by Aug 30

content.rendered:
Applications are invited for the Patent Agent Examination 2025 course by the Academy of Patents. Use code NOBARD10 to get 10% off the course fee.

About the Examination

The Controller General of Patents, Designs and Trademarks (CGPDTM) has officially announced the Patent Agent Examination 2025. Scheduled to be held on January 5, 2025, this exam is an essential opportunity for aspiring Patent Agents across India. Below are the key details:

Exam Details

  • Date: January 5, 2025
  • Locations: Ahmedabad, Bangalore, Bhopal, Chandigarh, Chennai, Delhi, Guwahati, Hyderabad, Kolkata, Lucknow, Mumbai, Nagpur, and Thiruvananthapuram
  • Sessions: The exam will be conducted in two sessions:
    • Objective Type: 2 hours
    • Descriptive Type: 3 hours

Syllabus

The syllabus for the Patent Agent Examination includes:

  • Patents Act, 1970
  • Patents Rules, 2003
  • Designs Act, 2000
  • Designs Rules, 2001
  • Matters related to IP Jurisprudence

Notably, this year’s syllabus introduces “IP Jurisprudence” in place of the previously included “IP Administration.” The guidelines are not fully clear on the scope of “IP Jurisprudence,” but they represent a significant shift in the exam content. Additionally, due to the amendment in Rule 110 via the Patent Rules 2024, the exam will now also include questions from the Designs Act and Rules.

Eligibility

Candidates must meet the eligibility criteria as outlined in Section 126 of the Patents Act, 1970.

Mode of Application

Online

Contact

Candidates can contact the CGPDTM via email with any queries related to the Patent Agent Examination at patentagentexam.ipo@nic.in.

Prepare for the Examination with the Academy of Patents

Academy of Patents (AOP) is a not-for-profit initiative that provides IP-related education and training. AOP is supported by Sagacious IP (The leading Global IP Consulting Firm) and TechnoEd Foundation (A Section 8 entity that provides technical education).

Why Choose Academy of Patents (AOP) Courses?

  • Post-Exam Support: Advanced training sessions for successful candidates to help launch and grow their IP practice.
  • Expert Instructors: Learn from experienced & leading professionals in the IP field.
  • Comprehensive Material: Get access to extensive study materials and resources.
  • Interactive Sessions: Participate in live Q&A sessions and interactive classes.
  • Flexible Schedule: Attend live classes or listen to video recordings at your convenience.
  • Mock Exams: Practice with mock exams designed to simulate the actual test environment.
  • Viva voce: After clearing the written exam, you will also get guidance for clearing viva voce.
